```py
 map_estimate = minimize(neg_log_posterior,
                        x0,
                        method='BFGS',
                        options={'disp': True})
# Convert from logit(p) to p
p_optimal = np.exp(map_estimate['x'][0])/ (
    1.0 + np.exp(map_estimate['x'][0]))
print("MAP estimate of success probability = ", p_optimal)
```
